original_title: ROH & NJPW: Honor Rising Japan - Night 2
overview: ROH-NJPW Honor Rising Japan 2018 - Night 2 was a professional wrestling pay-per-view event produced by Ring of Honor (ROH) and New Japan Pro Wrestling (NJPW) that took place on February 24, 2018 at the Korakuen Hall in Tokyo, Japan.
title: ROH & NJPW: Honor Rising Japan - Night 2
